headline: Florida Republicans could ban abortion soon, worried Democrats warn
author: Jeffrey Schweers
sentences: TALLAHASSEE  The leaked draft of a Supreme Court opinion that suggests a looming overturn of Roe v. Wade will almost certainly lead the Republican-controlled Florida Legislature to consider further restricting or even outright banning abortion as soon as this month, Democrats warned Tuesday.

Democrats began to mobilize their base to combat any further restrictions on abortion access that would herald a return to the days of wire coat hangers? and back alleys,? as Rep. Robin Bartleman of Weston described the era before the landmark abortion rights ruling.

Ron DeSantis and the Legislature to expand the upcoming special session on property insurance set for May 23 to either ban abortion or pass a trigger law? that would make it illegal in Florida once the Supreme Court overturns Roe v. Wade.
Anti-abortion groups have called on Gov.
